General.Name: GIVOT OLAM OIL EXP ILS1
General.Description: Givot Olam Oil Exploration - Limited Partnership (1993) operates as an oil and gas exploration company in Israel. It primarily holds a 99% ownership in Meged oil field, which includes the Rosh Ha'Ayin lease I/11 covering an area of 243 square kilometers. Givot Olam Oil Limited serves as the general partner of the company. Givot Olam Oil Exploration - Limited Partnership (1993) was founded in 1992 and is based in Jerusalem, Israel.
